ol.li: Send feed specification to partner for review.
Partner send sample feed for internal review.

Work with partner technical team to ensure the product feed meets specifications. This process typically requires iterations of review, feedback, and incorporation of feedback. The review process will be collaborative and the duration depends on the state of the data relative to requirements and the time between review cycles.
Load the feed into the test environment.
If feed load is successful, approve feed.
Work with partner to implement daily delivery method.
